verses.verse: We give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H430>you,<s%> God. We give <S%H3034>thanks,<s%> for your <S%H8034>Name<s%> is <S%H7138>near.<s%> Men <S%H5608>tell<s%> about your wondrous <S%H6381>works.<s%>
When I <S%H3947>choose<s%> the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H8199>time,<s%> I will judge <S%H4339>blamelessly.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth<s%> and all its <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> <S%H4127>quake.<s%> I firmly <S%H8505>hold<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1984>arrogant,<s%> <S%H1984>"Don't<s%> boast!" I said to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H7311>"Don't<s%> lift up the <S%H7161>horn.<s%>
<S%H7311>Don't<s%> lift up your <S%H7161>horn<s%> on <S%H4791>high.<s%> <S%H1696>Don't<s%> speak with a <S%H6277>stiff<s%> <S%H6677>neck.<s%>"
For neither from the <S%H4161>east,<s%> nor from the <S%H4628>west,<s%> nor yet from the <S%H4057>south,<s%> comes <S%H7311>exaltation.<s%>
But <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H8199>judge.<s%> He puts <S%H8213>down<s%> <S%H7311>one,<s%> and lifts up another.

For in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> there is a <S%H3563>cup,<s%> full of <S%H2560>foaming<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H4538>mixed<s%> with <S%H4392>spices.<s%> He pours <S%H2088>it<s%> <S%H5064>out.<s%> Indeed the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4680>drink<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> it to its very <S%H8105>dregs.<s%>
But I will <S%H5046>declare<s%> this <S%H5769>forever:<s%> I will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
I will cut off all the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> but the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be lifted <S%H7311>up.<s%>
